name: One Click Marketing
description:
One Click Marketing of San Diego is an all in one stop shop for your digital marketing and website programming needs. We have a complete in-house team and pride ourselves off of not mysteriously out-sourcing anything. We have been in business for well over a decade and we fully believe that every good client relationship starts with transparent communication.
We have spent thousands of hours educating ourselves, over the 10 years we have been in business, on Google's consistently changing algorithm to be able to know exactly what to do to get the ROI clients are looking for. Digital Marketing is best learned through trial and error with multiple different situations and industries. We have perfected our craft to be able to streamline our knowledge into your marketing.
We get you results
We offer outstanding customer service
Our reviews are great
We have decades of experience
We boast industry-relevant awards
We rank ourselves #1 in Southern California for our industry (SEO), locally and organically.
We take on far fewer clients than we get wanting to work with us. Why? Because if your website has been penalized, you aren’t in an industry that is favorable for SEO or your expectations are unreasonably high, we aren’t the right fit for you. As a company, we will not work on projects we aren’t fully confident will succeed.
If your business is not the right fit for us, we will point you in the best direction possible.
We base our clientele on quality rather than quantity. We don’t want a high-volume client base. More clients means hiring more employees, which means less bottom-line for us. We would rather have you be able to talk to the owners and not a sales rep.
We do not outsource anything; all work is done in-house by One Click Marketing employees that cater to you and your business.
Thank you and Call Us :)
